      • UploadcareClient

        public UploadcareClient(java.lang.String publicKey,
                        java.lang.String privateKey,
                        boolean simpleAuth)
        Initializes a client with custom access keys. Can use simple or secure authentication.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - Public key
        privateKey - Private key
        simpleAuth - If false, HMAC-based authentication is used

    • Method Detail

      • demoClient

        public static UploadcareClient demoClient()
        Creates a client with demo credentials. Useful for tests and anonymous access. Warning! Do not use in production. All demo account files are eventually purged.
        Returns:
        A demo client

      • saveFile

        public void saveFile(java.lang.String fileId)
        Marks a file as saved. This has to be done for all files you want to keep. Unsaved files are eventually purged.
        Parameters:
        fileId - Resource UUID

      • saveFileAsync

        Parameters:
        context - Application context. Context
        fileId - Resource UUID

      • saveFileAsync

        public void saveFileAsync(Context context,
                          java.lang.String fileId,
                          RequestCallback callback)
        Marks a file as saved Asynchronously. This has to be done for all files you want to keep. Unsaved files are eventually purged.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context. @link android.content.Context
        fileId - Resource UUID
        callback - callback RequestCallback with either an HTTP response or a failure exception.
